effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
